name: Crispy Vegan Smashed Potatoes with Chimichurri
description: Crispy Vegan Smashed Potatoes with Chimichurri. These Smashed potatoes are baked to a crisp and served with fresh homemade parsley chimichurri. Vegan Glutenfree Nutfree Soyfree Recipe
recipeIngredient: 1.5 lb baby potatoes (, yukon gold or white or mix, see notes for regular size potatoes )
1 tbsp oil (, olive oil or organic safflower or melted vegan butter)
1 cup packed parsley  or one bunch parsley leaves and tender stems, chopped
1/4 cup basil packed or use cilantro
1 tsp vinegar, apple cider or balsamic or red wine vinegar
1/4 tsp each salt and black pepper
2 tbsp or more avocado for creamyness optional

recipeInstructions.text: Cook the potatoes: Add to a pressure cooker with enough water to cover the potatoes. Close the lid and pressure cook for 6 mins, let the pressure release naturally.Saucepan: Add potatoes and tap water(about an inch over the potatoes) to a saucepan. Bring to a boil over medium heat. Continue to cook for 25 mins or until tender.

recipeInstructions.text: Drain the potatoes for 5 mins. Brush oil on baking sheet, place potatoes and press with fork or potato masher to flatten to about 1/4 inch thick.
recipeInstructions.name: Drain the potatoes for 5 mins. Brush oil on baking sheet, place potatoes and press with fork or potato masher to flatten to about 1/4 inch thick.

recipeInstructions.text: Brush oil on the potatoes. Sprinkle salt and pepper generously. (you can also add minced garlic and herbs). Bake at 400 deg F (205 C) for 25 to 30 mins.
recipeInstructions.name: Brush oil on the potatoes. Sprinkle salt and pepper generously. (you can also add minced garlic and herbs). Bake at 400 deg F (205 C) for 25 to 30 mins.

recipeInstructions.text: Meanwhile process the chimichurri ingredients in a food processor or blender with a few tbsp of water until coarsely blended. Taste and adjust flavor with salt, lime.
recipeInstructions.name: Meanwhile process the chimichurri ingredients in a food processor or blender with a few tbsp of water until coarsely blended. Taste and adjust flavor with salt, lime.

recipeInstructions.text: Take the potatoes off the baking dish and serve hot, dressed with chimichurri.To make ahead: Boil the potatoes, flatten, cool and refrigerate for upto 3 days. Make the chimichurri and refrigerate in a closed container for upto 3 days
